title: Looking to downgrade T206 PSA4 Manion
author: z28jd

posts.post_title: Looking to downgrade T206 PSA4 Manion
posts.post_content: Just seeing if there is any interest from someone who has a psa/sgc 2, or a 1 with a decent front(back damage is fine). If you have that and want to upgrade to a 4, make me an offer

I'd be willing to downgrade this too, but it wouldn't be cheap, just throwing it out there to see if anyone is really interested. I'd prefer the same grade or even higher, back doesn't matter aka Pied/SC/OM/PB is fine. If you want to make a trade offer, go for it.

I hate to maker offers. Would you be willing to sell it without trade. If so , Let me know your asking price. 

John

Thanks Jake and now someone else will enjoy the Waddell. It is sold/traded

  Manion still up for grabs

would you consider selling the manion outright?

price?

[quote name="sdkammeyer" post=1054149]would you consider selling the manion outright?

price?[/QUOTE]

The reason I don't want to do that is because I have the set, if I'm going to pull a card from it, I want to make sure I have the replacement card already. So I'd rather not. 

If I sell it outright, the price is going to be much higher and the way I am, I'm not sending it out until I buy another already. So if someone wants to overpay to get it, by all means, but I'd rather work out a fair deal for both sides and make a trade
